title: Madras HC permits TESO meet at YMCA grounds
content: The Hindu DMK President M. Karunanidhi along with (from left) DMK Treasurer M.K. Stalin, Nava Sama Samaja Party president Wikramabahu Karunaratne, Lok Jana Sakthi president Ram Vilas Paswan and DMK General Secretary Anbazhagan ahead of the TESO Conference at the Accord Metropolitan Hotel in Chennai on Sunday. Photo: R. Ragu The Madras High Court on…
